name: Big City Smash-er Wild Rampage
description:
Let’s enter into the modern city with the wild animals. This is your chance to create some crazy rampage in the street and smash the entire world into small pieces with the most dangerous and wild animals. Start the heavy destruction in the city attack game in which you are the angry wild monster to destroy everything around the city. Show some anger and spread the terror among the innocent citizens. Conquer the whole world through the long lasting devastation.
The huge building is in your hands and you are the wild dinosaur that is ready to destroy whatever you want. This is the survival mission in the dinosaur simulator. Put your heavy feet anywhere you want. Blow out the buildings and houses of the citizens with your heavy hands within just few seconds. Destroy the cities with different wild animals like fire breathing dragon that will smash the whole universe at once.
Survive in the grand city with smashing and crushing. Explore the entire area and get more points with epic disaster. You are the real city hunter. Rampage all the streets around the country. Spread all the havoc and crushing all around. This is the thrilling wild attack simulator game. In this game you are the real monster smasher to destroy huge buildings. Complete the level by destroying the building within the given time. Act like a crazy animal that everyone will remember you for ages! Be the mega monster wild hunter in the rampage and accomplish the survival mission with your wrath.
This is the best gorilla attack simulator game in which you are the monster smasher and you need to attack people as an ultimate city hunter. Take full advantage of the wild gorilla for the rampage. Destroy the target as you don’t have much time so be as fast as you can so that you can unlock other wild animals also. Be an angry wild dinosaur to attack. Smashing is your ultimate goal to complete. Conquer the cities. You are the incredible monster in this animal attack simulator. Crush and smash all the citizens as well.
The modern city is all set for the wild rampage by the monster smasher. Destroy, crush all the targets so that you can rule in this wild world. This city hunter is all about the thrilling challenges that are to be accomplished by the crazy animal. Take control of the super gorilla and dinosaur and rampage the world. Your ultimate goal in this city assault attack simulator is to win the battle that has been started between the mega monster and humanity.
Attack everything you see because this is what the whole smash simulator is all about. Explore different areas and street around for the punch down. You are the real monster smash to attack city. Hunt the entire city and rampage the world with your attacking techniques. Be the super wild hunter in this wild attack destruction simulator. Punch down the buildings, crush houses and crush everything in your way.
Police and army is waiting for you as you have created all the monster smash around the world. But you are the super power and you need to fight and crush them completely. There is no other choice for you as a wild gorilla. The crazy animal is ready for the ultimate city smash.

*******Features*********
Rich HD graphics of the angry animal smasher simulator
Realistic modern city environment
Different mega monster for attacking
3D mega monster attack simulation

******How To Play********
Start the hunter simulator game
Select the level from 10 levels
Select the monster to attack from multiple options
Use map for navigation
Use on screen controls to move around
Smash the target within the time limit
